name: invasion
description: Invasion (2000) mega-package: multicolor focus, Kicker (including dual/enemy-color kickers and non-mana variants), proto-Domain scaling, split-like modal templates, allied-color cycles (battlemages, dragons), ETB tapped allied duals, protection-hate, and color-matters effects.
